task: Look for a Coursera course (not Specialization) that teaches Java programming basics.
observation: The most recent observations show that the search for "Java programming basics" on Coursera has yielded several courses related to basic Java programming. One suitable course is "Fundamentals of Java Programming" offered by Board Infinity. It is a beginner-level course designed to teach Java programming fundamentals over a period of 1-4 weeks. Other options include "Introduction to Java" by LearnQuest and several courses by Duke University focusing on Java principles and problem-solving with software. This summary only reflects the latest findings, and it's recommended to refer to the complete task history for full context.
